Detailed Description

Reply to a GetUserDataRequestPacket with data if status is OK.

If there is data in the packet then it is stored like this. {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & elementTypes \ +4 & 2 bytes & nbrFields \ nbrFields & data & Fields (UserUser, & & UserCellular)\ last & 2 byte & Group type \ {tabular}

Definition at line 455 of file UserPacket.h.
